sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3140 ( MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MEDI_SEQN)+1,1) FROM YETA3140 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , Replace(#rsnoNumb#,'-','') , #psclHpyn# , #vendNumb# , #vendName# , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #mediCfcd#, '11')) , #cashUect# , #cashUeam# , #ctifTrea# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3140 SET MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , RSNO_NUMB=Replace(#rsnoNumb#,'-','') , PSCL_HPYN=#psclHpyn# , VEND_NUMB=#vendNumb# , VEND_NAME=#vendName# , MEDI_CFCD= (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #mediCfcd#, '11')) , CASH_UECT=#cashUect# , CASH_UEAM=#cashUeam# , CTIF_TREA=#ctifTrea# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3140 WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3140 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, MEDI_CFCD) AS MEDI_CFNM , (SELECT C.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND C.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y006' AND C.MANGE_ITEM11 = MEDI_CFCD)AS mediCfcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, (SELECT C.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND C.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y006' AND C.MANGE_ITEM11 = MEDI_CFCD)) AS mediCfcdcommCdNm , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3140 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY MEDI_SEQN DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3140 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3140 WHERE MEDI_SEQN=#mediSeqn# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MEDI_SEQN , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RSNO_NUMB , PSCL_HPYN , VEND_NUMB , VEND_NAME , MEDI_CFCD , CASH_UECT , CASH_UEAM , CTIF_TREA , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3140 WHERE 1=1
MEDI_SEQN = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY MEDI_SEQN DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3140 WHERE 1=1
MEDI_SEQN = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
